freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign name>${row["Drug"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign category>${row["Drug category"]?trim}</#assign> create custom-table-row drug "${name}" custom-table-row drug "${name}" set link-target drug_category custom-table-row/drug_category/${category} exit </#list>
